title: Please don't nerf Diana becauase of WE
body:
It's is just one event, she fills her role nicely, she's tanky because she has no escapes, and can make LC$BIGPLAYS https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xAFmRdSSyb8

Please don't nerf Diana RITO she's perfect as is

replies.body: and was the last time she was relevant from  a competitive standpoint till recently

as a Diana player it makes me sad how long it was {{item:3070}}

Edit: At least I'm happy now that its being played again
She does need a nerf to either the damage of her shield (which is a stupid ass idea in the first place...seriously...damage on a shield?) Or to the duration of the shield.
i love how diana is right now personally. not to op but still strong enough to be a viable assassin.

Champs have never been nerfed because of one event unless they literally stomped every single match. Even Poppy has had a deathless bout in an event and stomped many matches without being touched. Don't be so panicked.
For people who don't understand the big play in the video, the Diana E kept 3 people inside the Rumble ult, the only other champ the could do that in LoL is Lissandra and Amumu.
That video is so old. lol.
